channel.title: TCGA on xiaoni's blog
channel.description: Recent content in TCGA on xiaoni's blog

item.title: Data from mRNA lncRNA and miRNA and match clinical information with R from UCSC Xena
item.description:
It’s very convenient to get datasets from UCSC Xena. Normally, datasets will need to be processed and transformed with R language.

Herein, I will recover the protocol of datasets processed.
